title: La Vuelta Femenina Stage 7: Vollering Seizes Second Mountain Stage Win to Seal Overall Victory
content:
Anna van der Breggen and Marlen Reusser go head to head on final Vuelta climb in huge battle for second overall.

Read the full article at La Vuelta Femenina Stage 7: Vollering Seizes Second Mountain Stage Win to Seal Overall Victory on Velo.
author: sstokes
